A: 1. A ceremony is the coming together of people to celebrate an _ (a) meeting (b) event (c) party
2. During a ceremony, there are a lot of food and _ (a) gifts (b) drinks (c) speeches
3. How many types of ceremonies are there_ (a) Two (b) Three (c) Four
4. A traditional marriage is an example of a _ ceremony (a) religious (b) traditional (c) national
5. Christmas is an example of a _ ceremony (a) religious (b) national (c) carnival
6. Independence Day is a _ ceremony (a) traditional (b) religious (c) national
7. Carnivals are _ celebrations (a) quiet (b) colorful (c) small
8. Abuja and Calabar are examples of _ (a) national ceremonies (b) carnivals (c) religious ceremonies
9. Ceremonies help to _ the people (a) divide (b) unite (c) confuse
10. Ceremonies promote the _ of the people (a) food (b) culture (c) clothes
11. Ceremonies help in educating the _ about society (a) adults (b) youths (c) elders
12. Ceremonies help to strengthen _ (a) arguments (b) relationships (c) buildings
13. Ceremonies encourage love and _ among people (a) fighting (b) sharing (c) competing
14. Ceremonies help economic development through _ (a) farming (b) tourism (c) manufacturing
15. A song is a group of sounds made by our _ (a) hands (b) voices (c) feet
16. We sing songs to show love for our _ (a) friends (b) country (c) pets
17. We sing songs to praise _ (a) God (b) ourselves (c) animals
18. We sing songs when we are _ (a) happy (b) sad (c) angry
19. Which of these is a musical instrument_ (a) book (b) drum (c) chair
20. Music has how many letters_ (a) Five (b) Six (c) Seven
B: 1. What is the name for the coming together of people to celebrate an event? _________
2. What type of ceremony is Christmas? _________
3. What type of ceremony is Independence Day? _________
4. What is a group of sounds made by our voices when we sing called? _________
5. How many letters does music have? _________
C: 3. List one reason why people sing songs.
5. What are the letters of music called?
answers_C: Ceremonies help to unite the people.
To show love for our country.
